title: Matt Drudge: 'It's Elizabeth Warren's nomination to lose'
text:
Famed conservative news aggregator Matt Drudge fired off a rare tweet Wednesday night suggesting that presidential candidate Sen. Elizabeth Warren is going to give front-runner Joseph R. Biden a run for his money in the 2020 Democratic primary.

“It’s Elizabeth Warren’s nomination to lose…” he tweeted to his 590,000 followers.

Mr. Drudge rarely opines publicly and only keeps his tweets up for a short time before deleting them. His tweet about Ms. Warren included a picture of her Monday rally in New York City’s Washington Square Park that reportedly drew a crowd of 20,000.

President Trump on Wednesday downplayed the size of the crowd but also said more of the Democratic candidates should follow Ms. Warren’s lead.

“Anybody that can’t get people standing in the middle of Manhattan in the most densely populated area of the country — anybody could do that,” the president told reporters. “I think more Democrats should do it.”

Ms. Warren is trailing Mr. Biden by 10.5 percentage points, according to the Real Clear Politics national average.

description: Famed conservative news aggregator Matt Drudge fired off a rare tweet Wednesday night suggesting that presidential candidate Sen. Elizabeth Warren is going to give front-runner Joseph R. Biden a run for his money in the 2020 Democratic primary.
